remarks: The product of two finite products.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Dec-2017.)
statement:
fprodmul.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodmul.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fprodmul.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. CC ) $.
fprodmul $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A ( B x. C ) = ( prod_ k e. A B x. prod_ k e. A C ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
